data.current_description: Reset an existing policy to match with templatePolicy
data.description_suggestion: Resets an existing reimbursement policy to match a specified template policy. Accepts policy-reset-input containing the policy identifier and template reference. Reverts all custom policy configurations to template defaults. Returns the reset policy object. This operation overwrites current policy settings and cannot be undone - use with caution.

data.current_description: Tag adds a tag to the policy
data.description_suggestion: Adds one or more tags to a reimbursement policy for categorization and organization. Accepts policy-tag-input containing the policy identifier and tag information. Tags enable filtering, searching, and organizing policies. Returns the updated policy object with the newly added tags. Tags are additive and do not remove existing tags.
data.reasoning: Summary is clear. Description is awkwardly phrased ('Tag adds a tag') and lacks details about inputs, outputs, and behavior. Enhanced to clarify the purpose of tagging, what inputs are required, what is returned, and that tags are additive rather than replacing existing ones.
